name: sharetribe-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Sharetribe CLI and SDK

scripts.deploy: npm run build && (npm whoami >/dev/null 2>&1 || npm login) && (failed=0; npm -w packages/sharetribe-cli publish --access public || failed=1; npm -w packages/sharetribe-flex-build-sdk publish --access public || failed=1; exit $failed)
